content: I wrote up the algorithm for const to pat decomposition as some form of pseudo-code: https://hackmd.io/@rust-const-generics/r19096qlt

RalfJ said:

I dont quite get this "unwinding" thing...

hmm... unsure how to explain it, I can write it in terms of Result
Result sounds good (is that how it's actually implemented?)
surprised by the way we treat raw_ptr :sweat_smile: but thanks @oli, this is really nice
I was thinking about how to follow up from today's meeting
Should we schedule an hour of sync time or some time or something?
I'm not sure if it makes sense to involve tons of people

I wanted to create playground links for all interesting arms in the pseudocode. Then, I wanted to create a hackmd for each proposed change, showing the user facing changes as well as the algorithm diff. Once we have that, we actually have something concrete to talk about
Sounds useful, I feel like there's some "higher-level intro" that is missing from that approach
but maybe you can do a bit of work on that and I can tinker with whta I'm talking about and we can meet in the middle
